about_the_game:
Step into an enchanting realm where your love for bingo meets the joy of rescuing adorable pets. If the thrill of scoring 'Bingo!' sends a wave of excitement through you, and if your heart melts at the sight of cute animals, here's a game that impeccably marries your passions. Discover a whole new spin on the classic game of bingo as you delve into an immersive narrative rich with charming characters.


In this unique gameplay experience, you're not merely playing rounds of bingo but embarking on a noble quest. The objective is to collect coins while you match your numbers. These aren't just ordinary coins; they hold the key to the freedom of your lovable pet companions. From bunnies and squirrels to sugar gliders and owls, each pet awaits your rescue. Fear not, as your trusted canine companion, aptly named BINGO, is right by your side to help you in your missions.


Your pets are active contributors to the game. Their purpose goes beyond looking cute. Send them on missions to collect food for your furry squad, adding another dimension to the gameplay.

Personalize your gaming experience with options to choose between 2-card or 4-card bingo. Adjust the call speed according to your comfort, and pick a Male or Female voiceover for the number calls. For a more relaxed experience, opt for the auto-daub feature and never worry about missing a bingo call. This game is much more than just a standard bingo app—it's an adventure where each match is a step closer to rescuing your cherished pets and experiencing the joy of a perfect bingo.

If the thrill of scoring 'Bingo!' sends a wave of excitement through you, and if your heart melts at the sight of cute animals, here's a game that impeccably marries your passions. name: Bingo Pets - Save the Pets

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G5400 / AMD Ryzen 3 2200G
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 / Nvidia GeForce 710 / AMD Radeon HD 6450
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD Ryzen 3 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 6000 / Nvidia GeForce 720 / AMD Radeon HD 5570
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Embark on missions to save adorable pets while enjoying your favorite bingo games.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Czech*, Danish*, Dutch*, Japanese*, Korean*, Polish*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Russian*, Swedish*, Thai*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*, Indonesian*, Malay*
*languages with full audio support
